author: jvanzyl
msg: - Velocity can now operate with a get(key) method in an object
that doesn't specifically implement the Map interface. Just
makes things a little more flexible.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - added a get(key) method to the provider for testing.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - adding a test for the new ability of velocity to use a get(key)
method of an object that doesn't implememnt the Map interface.
This will be much more convenient. You can now just whack a
get(key) method in any object and vel will find it. Vel was
once like this and it probably should have stayed that way.

author: geirm
msg: No functional change.  Fix for clean javadoc build.
